Get an Affordable & Personalized Hearing Aid (specially designed for you)

Solutions offered:

  • We frequently provide hearing care for employees from the Puget Sound Naval Shipyard, Sub-Base Bangor, and NAVSEA Keyport
  • We offer repairs, maintenance, and professional cleanings for all makes and models of hearing aids
  • We help you to understand the fundamental science behind your tinnitus
  • We provide significantly better protection by fitting into your ear canal perfectly
  • We are certified providers of the Levo System by Otoharmonics
  • We are proud to carry Power One known for being the longest-lasting hearing aid batteries on the market

#1 HEARING CENTER IN BREMERTON

We offer the latest in hearing healthcare technology in a low-pressure environment that puts your needs first.

Welcome to Kitsap Audiology

At Kitsap Audiology, we’ve been helping our Kitsap and Olympic Peninsula community hear better for the last 25 years! We take great pride in caring for the hearing needs of individuals in our local area, and offer a warm and welcoming experience every time you visit.

By combining the latest advancements in hearing technology with the highest level of audiological expertise, we’re proud to provide our patients with the best hearing healthcare available. We’ve been designing customized solutions for our patients for over a quarter century, and treat each individual we see as if they were family.

Whether you’re in need of hearing aids for the first time or rely on customized ear plugs to preserve your hearing, our experienced staff will take the time to listen to your needs and concerns. Visit Kitsap Audiology today and hear the difference!

What our patients say about us

Every time I've been in there the staff recognizes me without a beat. They are so warm and friendly and make me feel like a part of their family. It doesn't matter who I see my experience is always a good one and always leave with a smile on my face.

- Krissy S

Expert Advice, Personalized Care and Exceptional Value

Personalized Care

Our experienced certified staffs work exclusively to serve your needs. With the customization and personalization available with our affordable hearing aids, you are sure of finding the best hearing aids to fix your hearing problems.

Experience

Have a better feel of life by our hearing care professionals with 25+ years of experience who are dedicated in bringing you the latest hearing aid technology. We are very focused on individual hearing needs.

Innovative Technology

We work round the clock to invent more and more in our service just to sophisticate our patients from infants to elders. Our wireless hearing aid increases flexibility & are compatible with all mobile devices. You can even stream your calls & music to your wireless hearing aids.
